name: Mobile Spec Analyzer
description: Explore mobile dataset; predict price, RAM, battery & specs.
longDescription:
## Mobile Spec Analyzer

This extension lets you: 
- Browse and inspect the mobile devices dataset.
- View enhanced feature engineering outputs.
- Run price, RAM, and battery prediction workflows (Nuxt + Python API + MATLAB trained models).
- Visualize model comparison charts.

### Architecture
Hybrid MATLAB training + Python inference + Nuxt UI.

### Features
1. Dataset insights (feature importance, trends).
2. Prediction tool (enter specs, get multi-model outputs).
3. MAT file viewer (quickly inspect .mat metadata).

### Notes
Requires read access & experimental APIs for future auth integration.

scopes.name: experimental-api
scopes.reason: Use experimental auth API for user verification
